level.heading: Audible notification of expiration of useful life of smoke alarms.
level.text: * ยง 28-312.5 Audible notification of expiration of useful life of smoke alarms. All smoke alarms installed after the effective date of this section shall comply with UL 217, shall employ a non-removable, non-replaceable battery that powers the alarm for a minimum of 10 years, and shall be of the type that emits an audible notification at the expiration of the useful life of the alarm. * NB Effective April 1, 2014
